Interface Transport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

      • putContent

        org.w3c.dom.Document putContent(java.lang.String action,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                              java.io.File file,
                              java.lang.String filename,
                              CountingMultipartRequestEntity.ProgressListener listener)
        Performs an file upload
        Parameters:
        action - Pydio class action constant
        params - A map of parameters that go with the action
        file - The local file which content is to be uploaded
        filename - The remote file name if different of the local file one
        listener - A progress listener
        Returns:
        An XML Document object

      • putContent

                              java.lang.String filename,
                              CountingMultipartRequestEntity.ProgressListener listener)
        Add raw data in a remote file.
        Parameters:
        action - Pydio class action constant
        params - A map of parameters that go with the action
        data - Raw data to put on the server
        filename - The name of the remote file to put data in
        listener - A progress listener
        Returns:
        An XML Document object
